source.sqlReaderQuery:
select rosterId, organizationId from definitiv.OrganizationRosters 
where ceaseDate is null

select rosterId, organizationId, commencementDate, ceaseDate, defaultPeriodDurationType 
from definitiv.OrganizationRosters 
where rosterId in (
'A3AC240D-A6EB-45A5-A5C5-792B8B20ADA1'
)
order by commencementDate, ceaseDate
